title: THE CHRONICLES OF MATTHEW SHAW
description: Matthew Shaw was a seemingly normal man, leading an average and mundane life, until in the space of just two days his whole world was turned upside down. Everything that Matt has ever known and believed in has been smashed to pieces, the world is being torn apart by demons and the love of his life has been taken to Hell and is slowly being seduced by Lucifer himself. Matt has been rescued by the angels of the Cremluk Shield. He has been told that he is the Chosen One. He is the one and only being that can destroy Lucifer. The fate of not only the angels but mankind rests on his shoulders. For as Matt is trained by the angels, Lucifer begins the final preparations for his take over. Matt has no choice but to join the angels in their war against the greatest evil the world has seen. The final war is coming, which side will you choose?
author: J.L. PAGE
